system.description: You’ve spent so much time underground that you have a natural feel for it. You always have a sense of how deep you are and which direction is north, provided that you’ve traveled in these regions before. You are also generally aware of the physical and political geography of the region (e.g., “the old dwarf colony is this way and those tunnels are part of the wererat pack’s hunting grounds”). You know where relatively safe places to camp are located and you can usually find fresh sources of water.
